content: create a dishcloth with the tunisian net stitch this texture rich stitch is made from two tunisian stitches in a fun repetitive pattern by using a cotton yarn this tunisian net dishcloth will hold for all kinds of cleaning tasks from washing one s face to washing dishes in the kitchen skill level intermediate finished size 8 x 8 20 5 cm x 20 5 cm i invite you to join the creations by courtney community on facebook for crochet alongs commaraderie and more take me there 1 buy more save more **shop10** save 10% on 3-8 patterns **shop15** save 15% on 9-14 patterns **shop25** save 25% on 15+ patterns all patterns must be in your cart at the time of purchase to receive the discount all crochet patterns are thoroughly tested by various levels of crocheters and/or tech edited for clarity and accuracy if you require any assistance with a pattern i can be contacted by email pattern will be instantly available for download upon receipt of payment due to the nature of this digital product refunds will not be issued ©2023 this pattern is not to be duplicated or resold and not to be reproduced commercially you may sell finished products on etsy at farmers markets and craft fairs but please credit creations by courtney as the pattern s author 1 http //www facebook com/groups/creationsbycourt
